svg.text: October 16-18, 2025 | Optimal timing for conference attendance

g.text: • Allow extra 15 minutes during peak hours (7:30-9:00, 17:00-18:30)
• Bolt/Uber as backup (save app & payment method)
• Covered stops for most bus/tram routes

svg.text: Times are approximate. Check real-time schedules via Tallinn Transport app or website.
